title: Miskatonic University
description: For anyone who has ever been caught in Lovecraft's spell, and everyone who loves a good horror tale, here are 13 original stories that will introduce readers to the dark side of education, and prove once and for all that a little arcane knowledge can be a dangerous thing.A letter from the president to incoming students / by Stefan Dziemianowicz --Kali Yuga comes / by Tina L. Jens --Teachers / by Mort Castle --Her misbegotten son / by Alan Rodgers --Scavenger hunt / by Brad Linaweaver --Black celebration / by Jay Bonansinga --To be as they / by Stephen Mark Rainey --Second movement / by Benjamin Adams --A dreaming of dead poets / by Jane M. Lindskold --Mandelbrot moldrot / by Lois H. Gresh --The smile of a mime / by Billie Sue Mosiman --The sothis radiant / by Will Murray --The play's the thing / by Christie Golden --Ghoulmaster / by Brian McNaughton
author: Martin H. Greenberg
